title: Little Critterz Seal - Harbor Seal Pup Andre - Home Decor Birthday Gift Miniature Porcelain Figurine
features: MINIATURE IN SIZE: Approximately 1.5 " x 1.7" or 3.8 cm x 4.5 cm (height and length varies by animal)

CRAFTSMANSHIP: Little Critterz figurines are carefully hand made by our artisans. First, artist-carvers study, form and mold each animal to recreate it realistically. Next, we select and mix the best porcelain we can find and finally, using specialized brushes, glaze and color is applied to produce very fine details.

UNIQUE, COLLECTIBLE, TIMELESS: Each figurine is unique, and no two are exactly alike, just as in nature where each animal is an individual in color and detail. Our figurines are meant to be collectibles or gifts. They will remind you of a time, place, friend or loved one, as you appreciate the amazing details.

PACKAGING, CARE & HANDLING: Each figurine comes in its own box, complete with a story about the animal. The figurine arrives glued to a paper card. To separate the card from the figurine, dip the animal and card in warm water and let the glue dissolve. Use a soft lint free cloth to gently clean the figurine. Never use cleaning products that contain bleach, ammonia, or abrasives as these will damage your figurine.
PRODUCT SAFETY: Little Critterz figurines are decorative items intended for ages 13+. Warning! Choking Hazard. Small parts. Not for children under 3 years.
description: Little Critterz Â are adorable, collectible carded miniature porcelain figurines, about 1.75 " high or long depending on the shape of each of each animal. Each is hand crafted and hand painted by skilled artisans to represent the unique color and detail of each animal. A perfect gift for your friends, family or yourself and a delightful addition to any collection. Packaged in a clear 2" x 2" , recyclable plastic collector box.<

Harbor Seals, with no external ear flaps, are found in the coastal waters of the northern Atlantic & Pacific oceans. True seals have small flippers and move on land by flopping along on their bellies.
Decorative Item Only. WARNING! CHOKING HAZARD. Not for children under 3 years. Not intended for consumption or for use in stove, microwave or dishwasher.
